name: Hexaspace
description:
Hexaspace is a turn-based party game for 2 to 4 players with local multiplayer.

Controllers are required! To play the game, you need 1 controller for each player

Features:

  • Select your fleet and show your colors with the customisation options!
  • Hexagons
  • Cool space ships (they explode)

Known bugs: (None of which will be fixed, most likely)

  • Some spaces stay highlighted: Yep. They sure do
  • The Ship View in the lower right corner doesn't display the correct stats: Pressing one of the bumpers should fix that
  • Cycling through ships fixates the camera on the wrong ship: I wish I knew why
  • Hovering over armor / shields doesn't display that component's stats: I love me some buggy UI
  • The start and end screens of a match look like garbage: I just got lazy ngl
  • The options don't show the currently set options: Luckily the screen settings are not expansive enough for that to matter anyways, and selecting the sound option you want to adjust usually rectifies this bug, yay
